title: Germany Bankruptcies
description: Bankruptcies in Germany decreased to 1147 Companies in August from 1154 Companies in July of 2022. Bankruptcies in Germany averaged 1669.75 Companies from 1975 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 3755 Companies in March of 2004 and a record low of 416 Companies in November of 1979. In Germany, bankruptcies account for insolvent corporations who cannot repay their debts to creditors and carry on with their business. This page provides - Germany Bankruptcies - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Federal Statistical Office
